result.arabic_text: وَمِن قَوۡمِ مُوسَىٰٓ أُمَّةٞ يَهۡدُونَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَبِهِۦ يَعۡدِلُونَ
result.translation: (159) And among the people of Moses is a community[412] which guides by truth and by it establishes justice.
result.footnotes: [412]- Those of them who accepted and followed the final prophet, Muḥammad (ﷺ).
